meta.title: From PEDAL to PUSHER
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: The Tour de France starts this week in Lille, France. We're celebrating with Raddles that are vaguely bicycle-themed. Pedal pushers are a kind of pants, similar to knickerbockers, capris, and clam diggers, where the ends are cuffed and worn close to the skin, to avoid catching in the gears of a bicycle.
